What Issues: x
What could we improve: I didn't like that you decided when to place my order and ship it.  I had other orders to enter but you auto shipped the orders that families had placed and my others didn't get added.

What Issues: too many items i didnt order 24 pens i ordered 4 i dont want to be charged 100 dollars for these pens.  should i send them back>?  your ohone lines are closed on a sturday morning
What could we improve: you sent the wrong amount of items and are closed on saturday.  I work during your hours of being open.  i need help ti o fix my order.
Additional Comments: i need help

What Issues: this was delivery of items that were not included in original order
the pen that was ordered for a student was broken
What could we improve: I am happy with my order. Maybe just to have a few  more discounted books.
Additional Comments: Thank you!

What Issues: student order was not visible in my cart so i missed opportunity to redeem $10 coupon and apply bonus pts
What could we improve: allow me to set due date and submit family orders
Additional Comments: you should allow teachers to set due date and submit own orders like we did in past

What Issues: sending orders when you feel like it....no teacher control.
What could we improve: I use to get regular flyers and could st my own due date. now you just send orders out as they come in from parents so I am unable to control orders and get free books. I will just stop advertising Scholastic books if this is how yu are going to run things.
Additional Comments: very disappointing.....i think you have forgotten who is getting these books out to families. If you cant accomodate for teacher requests I think you will see your sales plumet1

What Issues: see previous
What could we improve: I really feel that my teacher order should have been sent along with the kid order. I have never ever been asked to pay a shipping charge for my books which came days later.  I also am not a fan of having to send out a letter with each campaign. I feel like when I presented to book clubs on my own, not on line, my students , more families ordered.  I am hoping things get better . I have 30,000 plus bonus points. long time teacher. Is there a hard copy catalog for teacher rewards or bonus catolog?

What Issues: see my previous response
What could we improve: I was never notified that I had parent orders.  When I checked my basket, there were no items in the basket.  However, later that day, I noticed that an order shipped.  Even today, when I check my account it still says that the order is processing even though it shipped.  Furthermore, I was never given the chance to select my free/bonus items, since I was no the person to submit the order.  Please call me at 7332-859-3292

What Issues: order processed automatically so I'm unsure of how long to delivery, unable to use coupons or reward points.
What could we improve: Order was automatically submitted which was okay, I might have missed a deadline, however, the order was shipped to another teacher, since there was also an order for the sister.  This was confusing to us.  There was no order summary or details about the order in the box.  I appreciate the effort to save on postage and packaging but we need clearer information when the order arrives, even if it would be an e-mail to each teacher with details.

What Issues: order auto submitted confusing teacher and parents
What could we improve: Delivery is amazing this year!  The ordering seems limited and adds unecessary limitations form teachers and families who are trying to maximize rewards o benefit our classrooms.

What Issues: one of the books was bent and stuck in the bottom of the box
What could we improve: deliver the book club magazines to my classroom each month
Additional Comments: I love the book club program, and encourage my families to participate.

What Issues: no problems
What could we improve: Take student orders, put in by the teacher. I should still be able to input them under their names. I loved that. I work at a Title I school and the parents do not do a lot on the computer. They would rather send in money.

What Issues: no freebies for the class such as stickers, bookmarkers, etc.
What could we improve: bigger type on childrens' names on order confirmations!

What Issues: entering student orders
What could we improve: Student orders
Additional Comments: Teacher order number on book order flyers.  Teacher should be able to put in orders for students.  Not every parent understands or knows how to submit orders online.

What Issues: did not open the box yet just arrived this afternoon
What could we improve: Not a good experience the fact that now teachers have to pay the taxes for their orders. Most of my bilingual families do not have access to order online so they choose the books and send me the cash and I order them as I have been doing for over 20 years . Not only was it a mess having them circle the books they wanted, to then me having to cut the page of the books they are getting and writing their names on the pages i cut, to then having to pay 13$ out of my $200+ order! Very disappointed
Additional Comments: Not planning to order again if this is the new way

What Issues: boxes were delivered in two different places in our district
What could we improve: I had two orders and one was delivered to a PO box for my school and one to the warehouse. It was very confusing.

What Issues: books became unavailable
What could we improve: prices have went up, teachers can't create their own order date, shipping took longer, and separating the book club site from the teacher site is not convenient

What Issues: book fair problems
What could we improve: Not expire scholastic points
Additional Comments: We are a small school and spend a lot of money. For teachers to not get to shop with everything that was saved for us was very frustrating.

What Issues: as stated before
What could we improve: I did not submit an order. My class due date is for next week and the order was placed. I did not submit it?

What Issues: Your pricing in your flyer is not being accurate and you are not allowing us to purchase books at the price you have advertised.
What could we improve: As a teacher, we are trying to purchase books for our students with money our students raised for our book fair. The books in your flyer that was sent home says it is $2, but you are refusing to let us purchase the books for $2 and giving our PTO a difficult time. Why put a book in your flyer for $2 if you are not allowing us to purchase them? We are trying to give our students a nice Holiday present using your flyer price. I am very disappointed with how this is being handled and unsure of why this is acceptable for your company.
Additional Comments: Very upset with this experience and how customer services has handled it.

What Issues: You submitted it without my consent.
What could we improve: Stop with the automatic submission of orders

What Issues: You shipped it without my consent.
What could we improve: You decided when to ship my books rather than letting me decide.  That is not your place to do...it is MY responsibility.  I was VERY UNHAPPY about that.  I had not ordered my free $10 books nor had I placed my teacher order. It makes me feel unsafe to have anything in my shopping cart because you might decide to send it to me before I've completely decided to purchase it.  I did call in twice and the First Lady was so nice and explained everything very nicely.  She told me you would honor the free $10 worth of books.  I waited to place that order in case there was another order so that I could get free shipping on some things I wanted to use my points on.  However, I did not get any more orders so I called in today and someone did place my order for the $10 worth of free books. I am also not happy with book selections that have been given to me for free....they are very WOKE and I do not keep them.  They do not encourage me to purchase things from you.

What Issues: You sent my parent order without my permission and I was not able to apply my monthly coupons. This is NOT appreciated because now I had to call a service rep (which is not convenient) and send a separate email so you can apply my apple grams and promotional offers.  This is so much extra work!!! I would not like this to continue.
What could we improve: Do not send out my parent orders automatically.

What Issues: You sent me a bill for $50+ when I have over $200.00 in my account.,My items are damaged;
What could we improve: They were all wet inside the box...not outside.

What Issues: You sent an order that shouldn’t have been sent.   I never closed the order out you decided that on your own.
What could we improve: I don’t usually fill these surveys out but thought I should do so now.   I am a little saddened on how you have changed your policies and your prices.  Sadly enough you make a lot of money on families and teachers ordering books.   However scholastic decided to change pricing.   We as teachers get $10 to spend but  one book is about all you can get with that.  You added .99 to all books which is ridiculous.   Not only to say that you got rid of $1.00 books.  It’s cheaper to go tot he dollar store to buy books.  Don’t even let me get started on the policy that you send books when I haven’t closed out my order.   Which means I don’t get extra points because they didn’t add up, but could have got extra points if you wouldn’t have sent the one order that you decided to send on your own.   Now onto the teacher points book.   Wow!  You seriously took that down several notches.   Disappointing to say the least.   I am debating on hair getting g rid of the scholastic book orders for the simple fact that I can get off of Amazon, or go to the dollar store and get cheaper books.

What Issues: You sent a similar book in place of what I ordered.
What could we improve: You sent a substitute for one book, and did not make mention of it, or how you would make it right.  I had to contact you to get the correct book sent.

What Issues: You placed my online order before I placed my students order (not all parents order online). When I placed the other order you tried to charge me for shipping. I had to make a call and spend time I don’t have to get the shipping charge waved.
What could we improve: I hate the new order form. I should not have to put my students orders under my name if they don’t order online.
Additional Comments: I will not order from you again. This is after ordering from you for over 15 years.

What Issues: You have not received my full order yet because I have not entered the class orders yet. The only orders you have received are the ones entered online by parents
What could we improve: Not impressed at all with the preset delivery dates. I receive the catalogs two days before the preset delivery and so you only have part of my books because the other orders have not been entered yet!
Additional Comments: Stop the preselected delivery dates and send us our catalogs on time.

What Issues: You didn’t have some of the books ordered.
What could we improve: Email flyers automatically to the parents

What Issues: You auto completed my student online orders, before my orders were due… I didn’t even get my fliers until 12 days into the month.
What could we improve: Don’t auto complete my students online order (I may have wanted to order something too). Also, send the fliers on time, not halfway through the month they are for.

What Issues: When you ship via USPS, they won't deliver packages to the address in rural VT, we have to go get it from the post office and there hours of operation are inconvenient.
Additional Comments: We were very pleased with the quickness of the delivery overall. Scholastic has improved it shipping times considerably :)

What Issues: What I already shared.  Automatic placement of order and multiple teachers orders in one box.
What could we improve: This month, you automatically placed my classroom order.  I have my own due dates that do not necessarily match yours.  I was upset that you placed the order without my knowledge.  Then, my books were delivered in the same box as another teachers books.  I get saving on delivery, but I would much rather prefer my books delivered with only my class orders.
Additional Comments: Please remove the automatic ordering.  It is not a good feature at all.

What Issues: We wanted to change the due date for parents who needed an extra few days
What could we improve: Let teachers choose the order due date

What Issues: Unable to order/receive free books that I earned.
What could we improve: Explain why I wasn't able to receive the free books that I had earned.

What Issues: Unable to link student to item they ordered when ordering and now packing slip isn't helpful at all.
What could we improve: I used to be able to put my student's name linked to item, but this past order I can not. Now I have to figure out whose item the merch belongs to. Used to be easier.

What Issues: Two separate orders were put together
What could we improve: You were quick to answer when we had an issues, it was great

What Issues: Two separate orders due to YOUR sweep date!
What could we improve: You could have let me order my books instead of sweeping my account. I had to make 2 separate orders. I had to hide the first box under my desk because I did not want the students who made the order according to my deadline, but after your sweep date to be disappointed. Teachers don't have time to deal with your sweep dates. Go back to the old way or give teachers the option! This new way is just a headache. Yiu have made a 20 year member very dissatisfied. I am not sure if this second grade class will order again.

What Issues: Thought I should have received a $10 bonus
What could we improve: I ordered on Oct. 23 and thought I qualified for $10 bonus with a $25 order.  I didn’t receive the bonus.
Additional Comments: Disappointed in the selection and prices this year

What Issues: This order was put through by Scholastic, not me. It has always been that I wait for all my class orders to get put in and then I have them all go in together. This way I get the rewards I am owed. By Scholastic putting through my first order that was $97 I missed out on $10 of free books. I use Scholastic so I can get books for my classroom. If this happens again, I will not be using Scholastic.
Additional Comments: I would like my $10 of free books. lkimball@veaziecs.org

What Issues: This email should not even be an open account any longer.,My order is missing item(s);,I have not received a package;
What could we improve: We have not yet received our most recent order and have a book missing from our past order. On top of all of that this email and account should not even be active!
Additional Comments: There have been enough issues with this that I am about to stop using Scholastic permanently.

What Issues: They tried to deliver on a Saturday. School is not open on a Saturday!! And it went back to the post office twice after that,I have not received a package;
What could we improve: Stop charging delivery fees. The  teachers have to cover them with our  own money
Additional Comments: The books are too expensive now. My families cannot afford them in low income neighborhoods of Brooklyn. Ny

What Issues: They tried to deliver my order at 5:30. The school isn't open then.
There were no problems.  I just clicked to fast
There was supposed to be a bracelet with one of the books and it was not included
What could we improve: Make it easier to add a teacher order with a parent online order and get more bonus points or free books. In addition, I had a colleague Teena Killen, sign up as a new teacher for each of us to get 350 bonus points each. We do not see these points in our bonus banks.

What Issues: There was no last name on the order, and I have more than one child with the same name in my class.
What could we improve: The box was in very bad shape when it arrived, but not sure that is a Scholastic or postal service issue.

What Issues: There was an item missing (teacher error) because I ordered for students whose family did not have access to the online form. I need the option to type in student's names with their orders so no students orders are accidentally left off.
What could we improve: Not every student's family has access to online orders. Can you please provide the option for teachers to order for students where we are also able to type in their names with their order?

What Issues: There are significantly less parents ordering with only an online option. I've always received many order in cash and check. Parent feedback is that the online only option is hard to navigate. September is always my biggest order and this year only one student ordered.
What could we improve: One book was jammed in so tightly that the box had to be cut apart in order to get it out.

What Issues: The student who ordered book did not have his name listed on the invoice.
What could we improve: Let me place the order.

What Issues: The school address was also set to the warehouse, so I went in to manually change it. I don't know why my first box was delivered to the school and this second box was delivered to the warehouse.
What could we improve: I submitted the order on Oct 6th and it never went through. I assumed it was processing and finally went to check the status, only to realize that it didn't go through. I ended up paying the $25 for express shipping. The box arrived on time to the district warehouse , where it sat for another week! I know that isn't Scholastics fault, but they changed they option so there is no longer house delivery. My class would have had there books if Scholastic still delivered to teacher houses. It makes no sense to end that option .
Additional Comments: Bring back $1 books, and lower point books. This is why parents  like Scholastic. They can buy the expensive books at Target or Barnes and Nobles.

What Issues: The quote was missing a line and our quote has to be exact.  Bonus items were order and the order was not placed.
What could we improve: It would be helpful if you would add in bonus points items to our school quote. I feel like I am getting a new person each time I try and order them after my order has come in.

What Issues: The packing slip does not include accurate tiele information for all books making the sorting for each child difficult.  I had to go back into the order online to look up titles to see which "spidey and friends" title went with which child and same for "Gabby's dollhouse" titles.
The packing slip did not match the items in the box.  It was for another campus.,I received something I didn't order;
What could we improve: The packing slip included was for a different campus.  Also, there was one additional book that was included, but not ordered by anyone on my campus.
Additional Comments: I have had many great deliveries from Scholastic and am looking forward to many more.

What Issues: The packing slip did not clearly label the book titles and there were two books with the same start of the title and no way to determine which book went to which order.
What could we improve: More clearly list the book titles on the packing slip at assist in book distribution.  There were two different books with the same start to the title and there was no way to identify which book went with which order which made distribution a bit frustrating.

What Issues: The order was split due to Scholastic's due date not mine. I gave the parents a longer time to order because I got the flyers late. I liked it when I was able to submit my order all at once when I wanted.
What could we improve: I would rather set my own due date and would like all the orders sent together.  This last time, one parent ordered early and it automatically shipped based on Scholastic due day\te not mine so it affected my total dollars spent.

What Issues: The order was shipped before I was able to get what I wanted.
What could we improve: I do not like that I cannot pick and choose when due dates are set and orders are completed. I totally missed adding the rewards I had because of these set deadlines.
Additional Comments: We are also very frustrated that we can no longer buy $1 books to gift our students. We have always done this twice a year from our own pockets and now it is just too expensive.

What Issues: The order was shipped automatically
What could we improve: I wasn’t able to change the due date and then the order was put through automatically so I didn’t get any of the rewards I would have otherwise gotten.

What Issues: The order was perfect....the billing department has some issues to resolve.
What could we improve: I received a bill at the school for my order, which was paid in full at the time of the order from my classroom funds.  I have to call to find out about the bill due to the fact that the totals did not match the total from my online order.  The representative I spoke with explained that the bill received at the school had a HIGHER TAX????  Why would that be.  Upon further protest from me that I had paid that bill at time of purchase, the representative was able to confirm that in fact I had, leaving 21 cents due- The HIGHER TAX, and explained that nothing further was needed on my end.  Mistakes happen and I am glad to have the issue resolved.  But I do hope that this doesn't happen to further purchases or other customers.

What Issues: The order was not processed for some reason, by the time it was processed the book was out of stock,My order was delivered late;,My order is missing item(s);
What could we improve: I  have had to call in for my order the last two months. It has been paid for and does not ship. It is really frustrating
Additional Comments: Having trouble with orders not processing and shipping after they have been paid for

What Issues: The order was automatically placed before we were ready to actually place the order.
What could we improve: Scholastic changed their ordering procedures and now orders are automatically placed. We did NOT get the appropriate amount of bonus points because our online parent orders were submitted differently. I'm really disappointed that this procedure was changed, that we were not notified of this change, and that we cannot change the due date.

What Issues: The order that was pushed through on the 16th was not shared w/ me.  No idea about bonus points or free books etc.
What could we improve: I want to choose my own due date.

What Issues: The order placed itself without my knowledge and I missed out on placing a teacher order or earning teacher dollars for this order.
What could we improve: I have never had an order place itself.  That is exactly what happened a few weeks ago.  This resulted in me not being able to place my teacher order and, more importantly, it meant I lost out on getting the free dollars I usually get when placing my teacher order myself. (This is usually around $10.)  I have no clue how or why this happened but really hope it doesn't happen again.

What Issues: The new way of ordering books is not conducive to our demographics.
What could we improve: The new ordering format will cause your company to lose money.  Many of my students' families do not have cel phones or home computers to order from.  Parents and students relied on teachers to turn in their physical orders.  Many parents did not even know how to fill out the order form on the back of the catalogs.  The kids would just circle the books they wanted and bring the cash to school.  I would input their orders online for them.  Now, this is not an option.  I have 30 students and only 2 of them ordered books last month.  Scholastic has made ordering too difficult for them, as not everyone is tech savvy or has access to technology.

What Issues: The first time I called customer service did not solve the issue.,My item(s) is damaged;
What could we improve: For some reason I had two accounts, when called the first time the gentleman said that it would be taken care of in 24-48 hours.  I called back after 48 hours and nothing was corrected.  The next lady that worked with me was amazing and solved the problem and made sure it was working before hanging up the phone.  Thank you!   When my box finally arrived, I had two books badly bent and the cover damaged.  Highly disappointed with the packing.
Additional Comments: Is it possible to get a replacement for the damaged books?

What Issues: The first live chat said my autosubmitted order would ship with my regular order.  It did not.  The 2nd live chat said that it would ship separately and was able to confirm that the order was in transit.
What could we improve: There was some miscommunication about an auto submitted order that lead to some confusion.  I also had to live chat because the site was not allowing me to use/choose my $10 worth of free books.  Live chat solved both problems but 2 live chats for one order is a bit frustrating. It was a small order to have that many issues. I do appreciate the fact that live chat was available and the staff was able to solve problems and answer questions.

What Issues: The diary ordered by a student was delivered without the lock attached.
The box was severely damaged
What could we improve: My box was destroyed when I received my books

What Issues: The box was destroyed. If there had been any weather, like rain, my books would have been ruined.
What could we improve: The box was destroyed when I received it, but the books were ok.

What Issues: The box was damaged. The box was stepped on, smashed. The books inside were fine.
The box arrived open
What could we improve: My Scholastic Book Clubs order arrived with the box already opened.  I also ordered Scholastic Magazines and it has been 72 hours since I ordered and I have not received my digital access code yet.

What Issues: The box arrived empty and there was a paper with one student order on it with a due date not set by me.
What could we improve: I received an empty box. I cannot reset the teacher due date which is different from the Scholastic one. Did you mail the box directly to the family in Daly City? Doing grades and have not found time to phone. Otherwise Scholastic is fantastic.
Additional Comments: I used to be able to set a due date independent of the one recommended by Scholastic. I set my earlier in the month. Thank you!

What Issues: The box allowed my books to be bent in half.  I was able to bend them back but it was impacted a bit.  Could it ever be an evelope instead of a box?
Additional Comments: Keep up the good work!

What Issues: The books were misplaced in my classroom.

The book I ordered was suppose to contain sticker sheets inside. The book did NOT contain the sticker sheets. I contacted customer service and they resent the book and again, no sticker was inside.,My order has incorrect items and/or missing items;
What could we improve: I called about an order and an order was resent but it was still wrong.
Additional Comments: Snow Wonder does NOT contain sticker sheets inside like it says on the website. I order 17 books using MY POINTS and there was no sticker sheets. I contacted customer service and they resent my 17 books and again, NO sticker sheets inside.

What Issues: Teacher order didn’t get submitted with class order and I missed out in bonus points.
What could we improve: Don’t like how the orders go through automatically now and the dates are set for you. My class orders went through and my teacher order didn’t. Then I had to submit mine separately and didn’t get as many points.
Additional Comments: Please give teacher control over order deadline and submitting the order. This is a frustrating change.

What Issues: Tax exempt status should be given at the time of the order. I am ordering through a school, and we have tax exempt status, therefore, I should not have to wait until after I have placed an order and be reimbursed for taxes.
Submitting my order without my approval and not getting my bonus money to spend
What could we improve: My class order was submitted without my approval where I was unable to use my $10 or use my points in that order. Now if I want to order something I have to pay a shipping fee. I am upset as my class just spent $350 in one order
Additional Comments: It would be great if they would give me the $10 and let me. Order without paying for shipping

What Issues: Submitted without teacher approval or chance to add things
What could we improve: My order submitted before I was able to put in my teacher selections and use teacher coupons.

What Issues: Some items my families ordered were not available anymore.
What could we improve: Let us pick a due date.

What Issues: Shipped to wrong location twice
Shipped in two parts. The second still hasn't shipped.,My order was delivered late;,I have not received a package;
What could we improve: I STILL haven't received my order and it says it was shipped on October 26. Only part of it was shipped and the other part still hasn't. I placed the order October 23.
Additional Comments: Several teachers are extremely upset about taking away the $1 book section. Lots of parents can't afford books at all. And if parents want to donate, I have 24 students in my room so that adds up to a lot of money.

What Issues: Shipped in another teacher’s box
What could we improve: My order was shipped in another teacher’s box, also one of my parents accidentally placed an order for 4 of the same book and when she contacted customer service they told her I would take care of it instead of helping her take care of it.

What Issues: See previous comments
What could we improve: I am frustrated with the fact that multiple times I have sent orders home with my name/sign in code and link, yet parents order from other teachers’ classrooms at my school. (This was not an issue before online ordering) Unfortunately, it has happened enough that I think I am going to discontinue sending book orders home. If I don’t benefit from the points and rewards, it is just one extra thing on my plate that I am no longer going to do.

What Issues: See previous comments
What could we improve: The parent said that they tried to delete the order from the cart and didn't want it.  It shipped anyway.  How do we return the item and get them a refund?
Additional Comments: Not sure why this order was submitted and I couldn't see it on my end.  I would like to request a refund for the parent.

What Issues: See previous comment
What could we improve: Allow me to set my own due date for orders. Students placed orders so far in advance of the due date that books they ordered ran out. If Scholastic is going to have a forced due date then it should also ensure that books are saved or better inventoried to guarantee that students get what they order. If it is available when they order it then you need to honor that with an expeditious due date.

What Issues: See previous answers
What could we improve: Correct listings and when calling customer service correcting order to listing as it was a fault of your not the person ordering.   Specifics- I orders two mini notebooks (what I thought were 4 packs), the images had 4 notebooks and nowhere in the listing (customer service rep admitted) was there any disclaimers that it was random and that it was only 1 notebook not a 4 pack. I placed an order for 2 and only received two notebooks. The best customer service could do was send me a different item for that price. As it was not my fault the listing was incorrect, the order should have been filled as was listed and changed for future customers.

What Issues: See previous answer.  Also check my emails to you prior to this survey.
What could we improve: I want to set my date.  Do not process my order for me.  I had more class orders that didn't get added because you processed October without my knowledge.
Additional Comments: Patent feedback is that ordering is confusing and prices are too high.

What Issues: See my previous answer about automatic processing and shipments.
What could we improve: Scholastic now automatically sets up a due date and when that date passes, they process and send it.  Unfortunately, the date that is chosen is not something I can change and does not suit my schedule.  So then I end up with two orders, one that Scholastic has processed (for my parents that ordered early) and one that I have to process (for those that ordered closer to my deadline).  This wouldn't matter to me except that I don't get credit for the total size of my order in bonus points and rewards, which I depend on to augment my classroom library.  If the first order was less than $25, and the second order was less than $25, I don't get any rewards, when in fact, if I could wait and combine the two, I would have an order that would allow me to choose a selection for my classroom library.  I would like to see Scholastic allow teachers to select their own due date OR not automatically process and ship orders.  Thank you.

What Issues: See above
What could we improve: Your departments do not communicate with each other.  You have sent me collection notices when I had a positive balance on my account.   I had to talk to 5 different people in 5 different departments to get you to bill my account properly and I still don't have the issue resolved.   I am done shopping at scholastic,

What Issues: Scholastic automatically sent me order through without telling me. I wanted to add books to the order and wasn't able to do so.
What could we improve: Let teachers know how to choose their own order date. It automatically ordered for me and I wasn't aware. I didn't like it.

What Issues: Received an email stating that the book order was being returned to the sender. It did not come to the school. I don’t know why it is being returned.
What could we improve: I have not received the book order. Parents are upset with not getting the order they paid for. And probably won’t order again.
Additional Comments: Multiple problems with receiving book orders this school year.

What Issues: Read my comment.
What could we improve: I don't like the new process of having parents be the ones to order online. I work in a low socio-economic neighborhood, and parents won't do that. They are used to giving me their order. I've been teaching 37 years...why did you change it? Now,it's more work for me. I just won't be handing out flyers anymore.

What Issues: Quality of experience. Prices. Ability to customize due date.
What could we improve: The prices were higher, there were no dollar books or lower priced packs for teachers, I could not change my order due date, and shipping took too long. I don’t plan to ask my class to place any more orders.

What Issues: Post office error. They delivered to a school on Saturday.
What could we improve: Allow the teacher to modify online order by date.

What Issues: Please see earlier comment
What could we improve: I received notice that an order had been placed for one of my students, then days later that the package had been delivered. Hunted for days, pestered the office, etc. and apologetically emailed the parents that I would be contacting scholastic and getting refund or new shipment. They let me know they’d gotten the books.  What??? His order was included with his sisters and sent to her teacher. How do I not go thru this again?

What Issues: Please have parents list their child's first and last name when they order.  When only the first name is listed I don't know what student it belongs to, as I have multiple students with the same first name.
Additional Comments: First and last name needed for all students!

What Issues: Payment issue as described previously.
What could we improve: I mailed my check in the envelope that had always been provided to us by Scholastic, as I usually put the extra envelopes in my book order file that I keep.  After the fact, I realized that there are no longer postage paid envelopes included in the new book club flyer bundles.  I mailed my check on 10/23/23.  On 11/3/23, I received an email stating that my account has a balance due.  I have not received the envelope back to my return address, which leads me to believe that it was received by Scholastic.  I called the teacher payment phone number and it was an automated payment center.  I had hoped to talk to a real person about this situation.  I have never missed a payment on anything, and hope to be able to resolve this in a timely manner.

What Issues: Payment by Book Trust takes a long time. I thought it was only supposed to take 2 weeks, but it took a month.
Part of the order was submitted because of the auto submit. TEACHERS SHOULD BE ABLE TO ADJUST THE DATE!
What could we improve: I'm very unhappy with the auto submit feature and the fact that you can not change your date. My flyers do not arrive to my school and give my families ample time to order. The last order auto submit put part of an order while my parents only had 7 days to put an order in because of when i received the flyers and when the auto submit released.

What Issues: Parents not receiving email in order to order.
What could we improve: Parents being able to order by sending order form to classroom teacher

What Issues: Parents having harder time ordering. Cannot put online code
What could we improve: Not take so long for delivery.
Additional Comments: You have made ordering harder for parents. They use to put online code in, now need to try to find Teacher. Your books have gone way up in cost. Teachers used to get $10 in free books w every order and now don't. Teachers use to be able to buy books each month for class. This new system is harder on everyone and more expensive. Not happy at all.

What Issues: Parent ordered from a different teacher.
What could we improve: It’s too complicated for parents to go online without a clue of they are doing. This new system without a code or any apparent due date is not the best.

What Issues: Packing slip missing

What Issues: Orders auto shipping no like
What could we improve: I’m not a fan of the recent changes like auto shipping

What Issues: Order was processed before I was ready to submit. I was unable to use the $10 available for that order.

Additional Comments: I was not ready to submit my class order. I was unable to use the $10 available. It is no longer available to me as far as I can tell.

What Issues: Order was placed and charged but did not show up in the cart.
What could we improve: I got an email saying a parent in my classroom ordered books. I went online to “check out” the basket was empty. The parent did order and the order was waiting. It didn’t not show up  on my account. So the order was automatically placed by the system. I was not able to add to the cart.

What Issues: Order was misdelivered
Order was great!  I made a mistake, and the customer service staff took care of it for me anyway.  I am very appreciative.
Order was automatically placed before I was ready.
What could we improve: The new way of ordering is not favorable. There are not as many options to use points on.  Gift cards are no longer available nor Mac books. Student orders were automatically submitted without prior approval which didn’t allow me to add my order. The older version of ordering is much preferred. This new version feels more like a way to get parents to shop for Knick knacks for their kids instead of teachers promoting books. Veteran teacher who has used Scholastic to promote reading and books is on the edge of no longer using Scholastic. Makes me sad as an educator. Bring back the previous way to order

What Issues: Order only included part of parents order s had to order twice.
What could we improve: Not preset due date and get flyers out in a timely manner to make those due dates.

What Issues: Order never came, but after contacting customer service, the order was here within a week.
Only child's first name was listed and I have multiple students with the same name. Item labels didn't match the packing slip, so I had to take time to figure out which item was which.
What could we improve: If you could be sure to prompt parents to list the child's first and last name, it would be very helpful. I had to guess who had ordered since I have students with the same first name.  Also, please make sure that the item label and the packing slip have the same name. I received two different kinds of invisible ink/spy pens, and had to guess which was  which since the labels didn't match the name on the packing slip. Both of these caused some confusion and took time for me to straighten out.

What Issues: One of my student purchases was out of stock.
One item not available. No option to choose replacement item.
What could we improve: Option for replacement items if not available.

REALLY getting annoyed with the way you are taking away books from us and children.

What Issues: My original order was never redelivered from the post office. Scholastic sent another box. But then, the post office delivered the original shipment and now I had two of the same order.

What could we improve: I miss the paper flyers. Some of my students are recent immigrants and cannot order online. I like picking my own due date.

What Issues: My order was placed without me knowing.
What could we improve: I have no idea why my order was placed without me knowing. I do not like that.

What Issues: My order was placed before I entered my student orders for the month.
My order was never delivered
What could we improve: The order was never delivered.

What Issues: My order was in 2 parts, which I found confusing. Customer Service explained your new system and gave me the 500 points I would have earned if the 2 orders had been placed together. Thank you!
My order was delivered late;,My order is missing item(s);
What could we improve: Quality checking at each stage.  I received the wrong flyers and toolkit and it was too late to fix when the mistake was caught. I received an elementary fair instead of the middle school one I was set up for.  I waited a week and a day after reporting this the day I received it, causing me to get the fair within hours of the first event.  I was not able to restock in time before either sale night which in turn highly affected our sales with everything being down to a last copy and customers not wanting to wait for an order.  I also didn't receive any of the table display stands or coverings even after pointing that out to my representative.  I wasn't able to do my classroom or teacher previews until after the sale nights due to receiving the correct fair so late.  This also affected the enthusiasm among the students and teachers.  I didn't care for the restock online due to many of the titles missing to restock then causing me to have to wait until my end of my sale to do paid orders.  I am still waiting for some of those paid orders.  I ran into not being able to do a restock the year before in time for my sale which affected last year.  I think going back to calling our restock in would be much more efficient and customer friendly.  Overall my experience this year will cause me to hesitate on hosting a sale next school year and look at other options.  Sorry, just being honest.  It was very frustrating and I've been doing these for 17 years now.  Thank you.
Additional Comments: It was very difficult to get someone by phone or by email in a timely manner.

What Issues: My order was delivered late;
What could we improve: I was notified by email that my books would be delivered the next day. Then two days later I was notified the order was delayed. This happened twice until I finally received my order. It took about 10 days. Maybe switch delivery services?

What Issues: My order was delivered late;
Additional Comments: When tracking my shipment it said my book box arrived, but it had not. However I don’t believe this was a scholastic issue and rather a USPS issue.   When I called Scholastic to let them know about the issue, they were amazing and sent me a new box of books!!!!

My order is missing item(s);
What could we improve: Your all online change has turned a lot of teachers and parents off. (Ex. 1.99 and dollar books--teacher store--bonus points no longer have technological devices such as iPad or MacBook).

What Issues: My order has incorrect items and/or missing items;,I was charged tax. It has since been fixed on my account but I have not been refunded for the first time.
What could we improve: I got charged tax on my first order, which cost me about $26 above the money I collected from the students. There were a couple of things missing as well. I called customer service to fix it, and they mailed out two of the three missing things. I am using my points to get the 3rd missing thing for that student. ( Frog Diary).  The agent said I would have to call after a few days to get my tax refunded because of an adjustment from sending the missing items. I haven't been able to find the time to call again during business hours. My students REALLY like ordering, and I love anything that encourages them to read, but I don't like that I had to deal with all the effort of sorting, collecting and depositing money, ect, and it ended up costing me $26. I will put in orders they request, and will probably do it again around Christmas because it's good for the students, but I am really bothered about the tax. That was money out of my pocket.

Some orders got submitted early and then I had to push others through at a later date. Due to your new policy for order dates, I was unable to earn points for the order total and instead earned points for two separate orders and I earned less bonus points. Please go back to letting teachers decided when online orders are due and please bring back the $1 Book of the Week.

What Issues: My name did not show as a listed teacher in our building. Parent tried to change it on her end (and again had screenshot showing it was now under my name) but the order automatically processed  under the other teacher's name before the parent could call to fix this or before I could call back and look into this.
What could we improve: The new system is terrible and not user-friendly at all! It does not link families to the correct teacher and getting that resolved was near impossible. I also do not like that it automatically "closes" the orders out as I lost out on $10 of free books and the bonus points from a coupon. Teachers are busy and while this may have been intended to take something off our plates it also caused some problems.
Additional Comments: Please go back to the old system!

What Issues: My items are damaged;
What could we improve: I am a little frustrated with the timeline for the flyers coming out. I really would like the September flyers before school. Additionally I contacted Scholastic and talked to a representative before school started  and she refused to send my orders early but two other teachers at my school contacted Scholastic on the chatting feature and they got their book orders early. I told the representative this and she would still not give me the flyers and no  consistency is not ok. Instead now I am a month behind. The October flyer is being submitted mid November. This is not great especially because the children will be getting Halloween books after Halloween. If the flyers will be coming out later the flyers should represent that and Halloween books should be in the September flyer and Thanksgiving books should be in the October flyer. Additionally, with the date (kind of being set) for me on the teacher's desk and it being longer than I usually gave families to order. I ended up submitting multiple orders so families didn't need to wait as long which led me to not getting the $10 in free books even though my second order and third order during the month would have qualified. The first order was submitted by the family before I even had my book orders because that family had a flyer from a different teacher (since the other teachers had the book orders before I did)Since only one reward is allowed I think it would be great if it would be ok for the second order to qualify even if the first didn't. You should have software that allows this.
Additional Comments: I had a great experience on the chat feature when I had two books that were damaged and the new books arrived in a week which made the family really happy.

What Issues: My items are damaged;
What could we improve: When you package the books into the box, take more care in placing them in there.

What Issues: My items are damaged;
What could we improve: Packed the books better. When I received my order the books had bent corners and pages very creased due to books moving around in the box. It is embarrassing that I have to hand those out to students to take home to their families. Knowing that their families spent their money for a product that should have arrived well.
Additional Comments: Teachers love to spend their own personal money on books for students. I have looked and it does not look like there is something affordable for teachers to buy this school year. A $2.00 book one can only get 12 for a class of 24 because that is already $24 dollars. When there were $1.00 books a teacher would be able to buy a whole class set and even though it may seem like a little difference it makes a big difference in the pockets of teachers. Also, I have noticed that there are not exciting promotions that if you order between this time and this time students will get a free sticker sheet or what not. That is something the students looked forward to and families. It would be great to see those things brought back and even the $1.00 books.

The glue held until the student put the item in her bag, and I noticed some had fallen off again.  I have not yet received a response from her parents, so I guess they were okay with the item despite the loose flowers.  I don't know if there would have been a better way to package this item.

What Issues: My birthday bonus coupon for 250 points did not register when entered correctly.

Left outside gate (book order) and flyers sent to a post office box that I have no access to.  I do recall seeing a huge bunch of flyers in the recycling bin in August -and wondered why - but the director of the school likes to throw things away and doesn’t give them to teachers. So now I see why we couldn’t/didn’t have a chance to order.
What could we improve: Allow books to be sent to whatever address the teacher requires.  I used to teach in a large public school where many teachers order but now I’m in a small private school that rents space. Apparently Scholastic has two addresses for the school - a physical address and a post office box. As a teacher I do not have access to the post office box where some flyers were sent.   As for the books -they were left outside the gate.  There is no big “excitement “ that the books have arrived. If I get them at my house I can bring them into school and then share with students and that encourages more to order. You need to change your policy.  Also putting a due date on the website just confuses parents when I want to choose a different date due to closures and holidays.

What Issues: Just the fact that I already addressed earlier
What could we improve: The only thing that would help would be to make sure that someone is at the school when the package is delivered.  The order sat outside the building overnight and someone cut the tape on the box and looked through the books. The whole order was still there, but I would rather not need to worry about it being taken. Someone is in the building Mondays thru Thursday. 9:00 am thru 1:30 pm.  I do not know if it is possible to request times like that though.

What Issues: Just that the the delivery company tried to deliver after we were closed so that delayed the delivery
What could we improve: The delivery people tried to deliver after 5:30pm...we are a business and close at 5:30 so maybe having the delivery company set to  come before 5pm, especially for businesses
Additional Comments: We have never had a problem with delivery before so I am hoping this is a one time thing

Please consider the ways in which you can do this.

Scholastic has had such issues over the past few years with shipping and now with the new automatic orders, it seems like more than a hassle than a help.

However, I emailed you and everything was fixed and my items were sent separately.

What could we improve: STOP mandating my order dates - I have said it before and will continue.  They fail to align with other activities and events and lead to fewer orders.  Additionally, you fail to align to local times and close out orders too early on those days.  I also know others are very unhappy with this a well. I also have noticed a reduction in items available in the Bonus Point catalog and far fewer electronics including no microwaves, fridges, etc.  I have been a very loyal customer and proponent of Scholastic for years but these changes, as well as everything ending in .99 and not already including tax in cost, are leading me to explore other options or possibly drop it completely.  Very sad as this used to be one of the best things in educational programs.

What Issues: Delivery was attempted several times outside school hours.

I tell other grandparents to spoil their grandchildren by giving to the school their grandchildren attend.  Other really like the thought! Order books, sent them out, everyone happy... Please check my ordering Right now I am trying to figure out with another teacher, Read Across American and how we can spend our $200 for books for Lincoln Public Schools.  Each child gets a book in March, we would like to be part of the giving...but the books can't be sent to me....saddened by this! Stephanie Nantkes

What Issues: An item was late
What could we improve: Bring back the ability for students to order through their teachers! Their parents are not going to order online for various reasons and there was nothing like seeing the joy of a student who brought in their cash, many times all in change, just so they could get that one book they've been wanting to read. VERY disappointed in Scholastic for taking that access away!

What Issues: An incorrect book arrived instead of the one my student ordered.

What Issues: An assistant teacher mistakenly made a teacher account instead of a "parent account" and one of the orders was placed under her name. We were able to resolve the issue by waiting for the order to cancel and then asking the parent to resubmit the order. All issues resolved.
Already explained why
What could we improve: Better customer service.  Already explained why
Additional Comments: Will not be ordering again.

What Issues: Already addressed in the previous screen
What could we improve: I am so incredibly upset with Scholastic I don't even want to encourage kids to read.  I have been ordering from your company for over 30 years (plus more if you count the books I bought as a kid). For the most part I have been happy with your products service and prices although it was a bit rough during the Covid year and a half.  I have been saving my bonus points for many years to get a new computer.  I knew the computer that operates the SMARTBoard in my classroom was starting to fail last year.  I was going to place an order with the bonus points towards the end of last school year but since I had a group that pretty much refused to read I figured I would wait and just order the computer with my first order this school year.  It is still a tough sell to get students to buy books these days but I am always pretty successful getting to the parents at Back to School Night. I set me due date with my students and parents, orders came in and then, before mine own due date I see that Scholastic decided to finalize my order all on their own.  Before my deadline for the students and parents, before I had entered my own order, before I could use the bonus money Scholastic provided and before I could place an order in the Bonus Catalog.  When I complained I got a polite response but its pretty obvious you don't think you need teachers as your middle man anymore.  Worse, when I went to place the order from the Bonus Catalog I was shocked to find that not only have you stopped offering computers but your new choices in the technology category include crayons, sand timers, staplers, and Silly Putty (seriously, Silly Putty?)  but no laptop computers and no desktop computers.  Seriously? How do these items qualify as technology?  Even the Flintstones had better technology than many of the items listed in the Technology category of your Bonus Catalog.  I am beyond disappointed.  Everyday I pray my computer starts so I can use the SMARTBoard.  Some days it does, most days it does not. The district does not support PC's anymore since they provided us with Mac Laptops so I am stuck either paying for a PC myself or finding one someplace else.  I had planned on that someplace else being Scholastic but alas, that is not going to happen.  To add salt to the wound I just read about your contest to award a couple of iPads to teachers because you are so committed to technology.  Seriously.....I can't even protest by not placing orders until you put computers back into the bonus catalog because sure enough, I had parents place orders with you and you processed them again without me (that is what this order was for).    I am pretty sure I am just going to get another canned response from Scholastic about this but this whole ordeal just sickens me.  Don't count on me making the effort I usually do to sell your books. You might still get a few orders from parents of my students but don't count on my promoting doing so for the rest of this school year nor into the future.  Obviously you don't think you need me anymore.    Michael Eklund
Additional Comments: You can add real technology back into your Bonus Catalog,  More specifically....COMPUTERS...like you had before.

What could we improve: Allow me to set my own order dates and DO NOT automatically submit my orders!
Additional Comments: I have written to you many times about this issue.  You have not changed anything; you have not given me any options. Please stop asking for my input if you aren't going to honor my requests.

Additional Comments: Thank you for another prompt and correct book order!

What could we improve: My last month's orders where pushed through and submitted automatically. Is that a new thing now?
I usually have families that order from Scholastic. I had no interest and wonder if having to set up an account to place oders discouraged the families.

Additional Comments: I don't think I got an email when my family ordered the book. Do you still send out an email when the families place an order?

What could we improve: Shipping time and packaging are great, but the cost of books, and less incentives (no birthday coupons, no teacher $1 books with $100 order, no weekly $2 books - only monthly) make promoting it to parents not worth it.
Additional Comments: Bring back teacher incentives from last year and
I did not receive my December flyer to pass out.

What could we improve: I did not like that you chose to ship a student order before the class was due. This hinders my (as a teacher) abilities to choose from special offers, etc
Additional Comments: I am not a fan of this new “express order” to one student. It takes away the perks of me as a teacher

What could we improve: I have bonus points I want to use but either have to pay for shipping or spend $25 on books.  I send home flyers and also send info electronically but my students just don't order like they used to so I never have $25 in student orders.
Let teacher set due date -NOT scholastic
Additional Comments: STOP the marketing to the kids. The parents are the shoppers! NOT the children

What could we improve: We miss the paper orders.  I think parents are confused with the QR code.  I know that it is the current thing, but we have families who aren't online.
It is very difficult to receive flyers and figure out order dates.  It used to be so easy.....
N/A

I do not like the changes that you have made to the way orders are placed.  I do not like that I have no control over the due date.  I understand that ordering online is preferable, but I have had parents that still prefer to send a check and a paper order form. I had accrued quite a few points and I used them all on my last order. As of now, I do not intend to order from you again, which is disappointing because I have loved ordering from you in the past.
Free shipping on any order.
Took longer to get here than normal.

Additional Comments: My birthday was in September. I would like my birthday bonus points but have no way to reach out to anyone. please
I did not track my order so that question was not applicable

What could we improve: Reactivate Club Leo
Additional Comments: Reactivate Club Leo

What could we improve: Not a fan of the new flyer format, rewards aren't as great, books are very expensive, selection is more limited
Additional Comments: I miss the $1 books...most of my families would at least get one of those if they couldn't afford to get anything else. I have a hard time suggesting books to order at a variety of price points since most books are $5 or more
One of the books on the bottom of the box was crushed (it was mine, so I'm not worried). The bigger books should go on the bottom to avoid this.

What could we improve: So far this year, my orders are down. I wonder if it is because it is all online. Most important thing is to get books in the hands of the students. Please consider having both as options. Also I have noticed that the dollar books and the 10 for $10 or 10 for $12 books are no longer. These are the books that teachers would buy monthly to ensure gifts for our students. Again most importantly - books in the hands of students. Can these be an option again? Even if it is just a teacher option for holiday gifts, it would be appreciated.
Additional Comments: I love the new interactive book order magazines. The students look forward to getting them. Thank you for listening and considering our concerns.

What could we improve: I think ordering teacher books with bonus points was confusing for me. But on the other hand I'm not great on computers.
The bonus point catalogue has far less options. I miss dollar book deals.
No, but I would have liked the option of having my books delivered to my home address.
don't ship through USPS! I believe the length delivery took was fault of my local post office as they had it at their facility for four days before they delivered it.
Additional Comments: na

I still have parents who would like to have paper fliers.  I received them and handed them out for September and October, but did not receive any for November, or at least not yet.  I like to hand them out before the new month starts.  Thanks for considering this.  I have very few parents so far who are ordering online & it makes me worry about whether or not there will be many orders this year.

What could we improve: I will actually not be ordering from Scholastic for a while. I am extremely disappointed in the new set up and lack of books that are below 5$. Scholastic was great when all families could afford books

Additional Comments: Excellent service....my order was complete and delivered on time.  The box and books were in great shape when delivered.

What could we improve: I don’t like that there isn’t a paper ordering option and I can’t choose my own due date resulting in longer wait times for families from the time they order to the time they receive their purchase.
I really miss the $1.00 books.  It was so much easier on my budget to get books for my class as gifts.  I could afford to buy them at least 2 a year.

Make more books available at $1.00 or $1.50 price.  I'd like to see more books even at the $2.00 price point, but there are very few books that are affordable for working families and teachers to purchase for their students.

Additional Comments: We are still waiting on paper fliers.

What could we improve: Book box was scheduled to arrive on Thursday, Nov. 2nd. It was delivered on Saturday, Nov. 4th. We are a school. No one is in the building for deliveries on a Saturday. This has happened repeatedly. The box is sometimes left at the rectory and I need to call or stop over there to check.  I would appreciate a M-F delivery.
Fix it to where I can order for the students again.
Additional Comments: No, and I probably and used to always give 5 stars but it is hard not being able to collect and submit student orders because we are a 100% free and reduced lunch school so they just don't get to order now.

I would like to order on behave of parents. Now scholastic is having parents order online but it is a bit challenging for parents to order when they do not know English. I would like for that option to be back.
I appreciate that my student order and my bonus catalog item arrived in the same box even though I ordered them at different times.

What could we improve: noe
I can't think of anything other than having the order arrive faster, but it might not be cost effective.
Additional Comments: Maybe you can add a section that is their Wish List. It can look like the old ordering form. I think it helps them see their "cart" right on the flyer.
I love using Scholastic for my class!  They have a great selection and very good prices!

What could we improve: Nothing.  You sent the missing items in a timely manner
I’m not a fan that there is a set date to order books by. My catalog came late and was given the book lates by the secretary after going through an overwhelming Mail Drop off.

What could we improve: I want to be able to set my own order date instead of having a pre-selected date.

Additional Comments: I wish you would bring back Apple products for the Bonus Points for teachers. I have finally saved enough points to be able to spend on a high priced item.

I will not be sending anymore fliers to my students unless Scholastic changes their policy on offering sexually inappropriate material to students. This is a huge mistake!! I’m so sorry your company has fallen to this low level of morality. I’ve been a faithful customer for over 25 years.

What could we improve: You ordered for me, without consent
Additional Comments: Please allow me to order on my own terms. Thanks
Super fast and easy.  Thank you!

What could we improve: REALLY DO NOT LIKE the automatic due date. I don't like that I cannot customize the order date.

What could we improve: I do not like the new way of you setting the date.  I forgot and didn’t even get to place my order.  I like to set my own date.
Always better faster, but I do get it takes some time.
Additional Comments: I did not try to track the order. I trusted it would get here. I am not absolutely certain the number of days for the order to arrive, so I gave you the benefit of the doubt. I do appreciate your service.

What could we improve: I would like to spend some of my bonus points that I have been saving for years, but ipads are no longer a choice. Bring back the ipads.   Also, let me set my own due date.
Additional Comments: Bring back the ipads.

I had a hard time finding items that used to be in a bonus catalog.

Additional Comments: Meant to push yes on the last questions.   Still sad that teachers can't get $1 for their students for Christmas. Would be nice to be able to get my students a book to help build their home library but with 40 students I can't afford $2 books.

What could we improve: I do NOT like how students are being forced to order digitally now.  I understand it's supposed to make things easier for the teacher, but it doesn't!  Most of my families will likely not order online.  They either don't speak English or are simply not tech-savvy.  It's easier for them to bring the money to me and the I'll place the order online.  (And I don't mind doing that if it means more students have access to books from Scholastic!)

Additional Comments: I have problems with purchase orders, this year and in the past.

None. Delivery was prompt and accurate.

What could we improve: The box was NOT taped shut or sealed. There was a not from the post office that they had to seal the box.
Additional Comments: This is the second box I've received this year that the box was damaged or not sealed properly. On my first order, tape was stuck to the cover of the book from the gap in the box. I was able to remove the tape, but I've had 2 poorly packed boxes this year.

What could we improve: Faster delivery from time of placing order
More teacher reward items
It would be nice if the books could already be presorted with the childs name on a bag of some sort, or even with paper tape, that way it makes passing out the books easier.

for teachers, offer cheaper packs for us to purchase for our students

What could we improve: I don't like the automatic order submission.

What could we improve: Is there a way to include tax already in each item?  It will help the parents when paying for the item by cash.  I collect cash for my students whose parents are not comfortable ordering online .This gives my kids more opportunities to buy when they can easily pay me the cash just like before.   Which means as a teacher ordering for my students, I have to pay taxes for my students' purchases which adds up a lot out of my own pocket.  Thanks for your understanding
Not loving the auto submission of orders.
Not having automatic order submission. It actually made things more difficult for me and should be an option, not a requirement.
Additional Comments: Auto order submission is a problem worth discontinuing Scholastic service.

What could we improve: I appreciate that online parent orders are automatically placed so that if a teacher forgets to place the order then it is not forgotten; however, maybe an email prior to the order automatically being placed would be  helpful or something that allows the teacher to go in and change the date that it will be placed. Two reasons this would be helpful: 1. If I have set a date for families then this avoids Scholastic having to ship two boxes, and 2. it would allow me to know when a box is being shipped then I could add my bonus pt order prior to shipping.
Nothing....you can't control how quickly the mail delivers:)
Send the correct order not ruined the first time, so I could get orders out to my students families in a timely manner.

Additional Comments: Very Pleasant Experience :)

What could we improve: It seemed like there weren’t prices on all the books and I really miss parents being able to fill out a form and turn them into us, like I’ve said before some families have no or limited internet.

N/A

What could we improve: Offer more $1 and $1.99 books
Let teachers submit orders on their own schedule.
you did great

Additional Comments: I ordered one single book awhile back and have not received it yet. It was 7 dollars. I thought maybe it would appear in a second shipment but it never did. I cannot find any other record other than when I ordered and paid for it. How can I find out what happened to it?

What could we improve: Most things are fine, but it is highly annoying and frustrating that the teacher is left to be the bad person when we will not submit orders that we never were going to do, but scholastic emails order offers to families directly who then submit to us.  Not a classy way to run a company, and I have been doing book orders for a very long time, but this may be the last year.  I do not need families mad at me because I do not have time to pad your profits.  In addition you dramatically reduced teacher bonuses making it even less worthwhile for me to give my time.

Although I understand why you are giving weeks that we can place and close orders, I miss being able to pick my order weeks based on what is happening at school (I don't like having book orders overlap with fundraisers, school store, etc).

A parent ordered online and I didn't know...in the past, I would have received an email from Scholastic notifying me about the order...then the order was automatically completed. Which means I had no opportunity to use points or add to the order. Please go back to how things were done previously and notify teachers when there is an order placed.
Would have liked to have been informed that there was not an order form for our parents.  We have many families that order but do not have access to a computer.
Additional Comments: Would like to receive a statement for parents for me to make sure they receive the correct books.
I would like the option to send the books to my house instead of my school address. The school address requires all shipments to go to our warehouse and delivery is delayed within our system.
The only thing I would change is the ability to alter the due date of parent/ teacher orders.
I've been using Scholastic services all 25 years of my teaching career. Always loved it and always will.

I selected to pay with check. I did not like how I received my order on Oct. 30th & then 2 days later I received an email reminding me that my account had a balance due from that same order. I know this and it will be paid in a timely manner. The order itself wasn`t placed till Oct. 25th, so it made no sense for me to get a reminder email stating I had an account balance. Just irritating on top of the new design layout of the book club flyers...while they have kid friendly games/puzzles on them, the book selection now is terrible and very limited.

What could we improve: Make it possible for families to order with the order form through the school again.  Ordering online does not work for the majority of our students and families.  The paper order form would make it possible again.
I prefer the old style of monthly flyers for the students.

Additional Comments: Very fast turnaround!

What could we improve: the shipping has taken forever. I ordered on 10/20/23 and it won't be delivered to the school until tomorrow. It says today but there is no school today.  I really hope it is there tomorrow.
As all business's are still bouncing back from COVID shut downs, you all have done an excellent job getting orders to us as efficient as you have been able too. Thank you!
As a teacher my time is limited. It would have been very helpful to have had the orders packaged together by order (students).

I do not like how I can no longer easily set The order date to meet my district calendar
Book selections and prices
Additional Comments: I don't like the order date set by Scholastic.  I set my own date and yet it allows parents to order whenever they want and then I don't get the rewards from those orders.  For instance, if I was short $5.00 in orders to get the rewards for that month and I send my order in and then two weeks later a parent orders, I don't get those rewards.  I know there are many teachers who have dropped out of Scholastic this year.  Need to return to the old order forms and let teachers do their own order date!!

No. It was a family order that the family had placed after my class order. I was happy I didn’t need to pay shipping.
Send more fliers and don't make it to where families can only order online.

Not sure at this time.
Go back to student order forms.   Many of my student families don't have access to good internet and don't want to use the online option.
Additional Comments: I love the customer service people at Scholastic.  When there are issues, they are amazing to work with. Your company is SO teacher friendly.  I love it.   The only issue I have is with family online ordering only.

It took a very long time from ordering to getting the books. Maybe make the ordering window shorter?

What could we improve: Send monthly paper book orders home. Parents are ordering less due to less paper book orders.

What could we improve: While I can appreciate the ease of having one due date- I ended up place 3 orders because I did not fully understand the new process.

What could we improve: I don't like that I so how had a balance of 0.01 cents, when I used a gift card for my purchase.
